entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
